name: mummy
content:
mummy noun [C]
(MOTHER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK (US mommy) child's word for mother: [ as form of address ] I want to go home, Mummy. Could I speak to your mummy please, Phoebe?

mummy noun [C]
(BODY)
(especially in ancient Egypt) a dead body that is prevented from decaying by being treated with special substances before being wrapped in cloth
Patrick Ward/Corbis Documentary/GettyImages

(esp. in ancient Egypt) a dead body that has been preserved from decay, esp. by being treated with special substances before being wrapped in cloth
